original: BRÄUTIGAM, Olof August, Civilingenjör, Göteborg, f Gbg 21/3 10 av konsul J A B o Adéle Pettersson, gm Gunborg Kihlberg. Realex Gbg 26, ex Gbgs hdlsinst 28, CTI lägre avd 29—30, h avd 31—35. Driftsing h ESAB i Gbg. Styr.ordf Chalmers stud.kår 35. Led Sv Tekn.frn Sth o Tekn Samf Gbg. °von BRÖMSSEN, Ädoph Magnus, Civilingenjör, Stockholm, f Sthlm 23/7 64 av grhdl A M von B o Charlotta Koch, gm (2) Greta Aurell. Mogenh.ex NLatin 84, KTH (maskinbygg o mek tekn) 85—88. Anst Luth & Roséns El AB 88—91, Schuckert & Co Nurnberg 91—92, åter h Luth & Rosén 92—13, dir där 11—13, inneh eg ing.fma i Sthlm sed. 13. Led Sv Tekn.frn.
translated: BRÄUTIGAM, Olof August, Civil Engineer, Gothenburg, born in Gothenburg on March 21, 1910, to consul J A B and Adéle Pettersson, married Gunborg Kihlberg. Real exam Gothenburg 1926, graduate of Gothenburg Commercial Institute 1928, lower department of CTI 1929-1930, higher department 1931-1935. Operating engineer at ESAB in Gothenburg. Board chairman of Chalmers Student Union 1935. Member of the Swedish Technical Association from Stockholm and the Technical Society of Gothenburg. °von BRÖMSSEN, Ädoph Magnus, Civil Engineer, Stockholm, born in Stockholm on July 23, 1864, son of Chief Engineer A M von B and Charlotta Koch, married (2) Greta Aurell. Completed secondary school at NLatin in 1884, studied mechanical engineering at the Royal Institute of Technology (KTH) from 1885 to 1888. Employed at Luth & Roséns El AB from 1888 to 1891, Schuckert & Co Nuremberg from 1891 to 1892, returned to Luth & Rosén from 1892 to 1913, director there from 1911 to 1913, currently owns own trading company in Stockholm since 1913. Member of the Swedish Technical Association from...

structured.name: Olof August Bräutigam
structured.description: Olof August Bräutigam was a Swedish civil engineer. He was born on March 21, 1910, in Gothenburg to consul J A B and Adéle Pettersson. He was married to Gunborg Kihlberg.

education.credentialAwarded: Bachelor of Science in Mechanical Engineering

work.roleName: Board Chairman of Chalmers Student Union
